This mechanism is helpful for typical "problem set" type questions, which may have involved solutions with detailed explanations.
text.text: Give an equation for the relativistic energy of an object with mass m. Explicitly indicate multiplication with a * symbol.

solution.text: Einstein's equation for relativistic energy is \(E = mc^2\), but this energy is rarely available to perform work. The kinetic energy of an object with mass \(m\) moving with velocity \(v\) is \(\frac{1}{2}mv^2\).
